Welcome to THE EAST SALON, where beauty meets sophistication. Our team of skilled professionals is dedicated to providing a luxurious and personalized experience, from cutting-edge hairstyling to rejuvenating spa treatments. Step into a haven of style and relaxation, where each visit is a journey to enhance your natural beauty and leave you feeling empowered.

At THE EAST SALON, we redefine the art of beauty and wellness. Our salon is more than just a place for hair and skincare; it's a sanctuary where you can relax, rejuvenate, and transform. With a team of skilled professionals, we are committed to providing the highest level of service to our clients.

Explore a comprehensive range of services designed to cater to your beauty needs. From precision haircuts and vibrant hair color to indulgent spa treatments and meticulous nail art, our diverse offerings are tailored to enhance your unique style.
Our team of expert stylists and therapists is passionate about staying ahead of the latest trends and techniquesWe believe in continuous learning and creativity,
                                                           

                                                           

                                                         ensuring that each client receives personalized and up-to-the-minute services.
We use only the finest products in the industry  to pamper and care for your hair and skin
                                                         Our selection of premium brands reflects our commitment to quality and excellence.
Take advantage of our exclusive promotions and special offers designed to add extra value to your salon experienceFrom seasonal discounts to loyalty rewards, we appreciate your trust in us and strive to make each visit worthwhile.
                                                        

                                                

                                


                                

                                      
Meet The team

                                      
Meet our style architects, where creativity meets expertise. With a knack for trendsetting cuts and innovative styles, our stylists are passionate about enhancing your natural beauty. From chic bobs to bold color transformations, each appointment is a tailored experience designed to elevate your unique style. Experience the artistry of our stylists and leave with a look that reflects your personality and panache.

                                      
                                 

                                          
The Trendsetter

                                          

                                                
                                          

                                          

                                                
The Trendsetter

                                          
Meet Peter, our trendsetting stylist known for pushing boundaries and embracing the latest fashion-forward looks. With a flair for vibrant colors and daring cuts, Peter transforms hair into a canvas of modern art, ensuring every client leaves with a style that turns heads

                                          
Peter is celebrated for her mastery of innovative color techniques. From balayage to ombre, his seamlessly blends hues to create unique and eye-catching color combinations


                                          
                                          
                                          
Shanaya - The Extension Enchantress

                                          

                                                
                                          

                                          

                                                
Shanaya - The Extension Enchantress

                                          
Shanaya our Extension Enchantress, transforms hair with the magic of extensions. Specializing in seamless blends and natural-looking extensions, Shanaya adds length and volume, creating stunning and enviable hairstyles.

                                          
Shanaya is celebrated for her mastery of innovative color techniques. From balayage to ombre, his seamlessly blends hues to create unique and eye-catching color combinations


                                          

                                          
Raj - The Beard Sculptor

                                          

                                                
                                          

                                          

                                                
Raj - The Beard Sculptor

                                          
Raj, our Beard Sculptor, is a master at crafting and grooming beards with precision. From intricate designs to classic trims, Raj tailors each beard style to enhance facial features, offering a range of options for the discerning man

                                          
Raj is  also celebrated for her mastery of innovative color techniques. From balayage to ombre, his seamlessly blends hues to create unique and eye-catching color combinations


                                          
                                          
Zoe - The Curl Whisperer

                                          

                                                
                                          

                                          

                                                
Zoe - The Curl Whisperer

                                          
Zoe, our Curl Whisperer, celebrates and enhances natural curls. With a focus on curly and wavy hair textures, Zoe brings out the best in curls, providing specialized care and styling that leaves clients embracing their natural beauty.

                                          
Zoe is  also celebrated for her mastery of innovative color techniques. From balayage to ombre, his seamlessly blends hues to create unique and eye-catching color combinations
